LanguageData.SpiritSwordFusion.label: Spirit Sword Fusion
LanguageData.SpiritSwordFusion.description: This being has fused with a Spirit Sword, granting use of spirit sword abilities if they have learned any sword art.
LanguageData.AscensionOfSpeedDemon.label: Ascension of the Speed Demon
LanguageData.AscensionOfSpeedDemon.description: This being has ascended into a Speed Demon, increasing its speed sevenfold. Demon ascendants consume twice as much food and go berserk once every 10 days.

LanguageData.AscensionOfPower.label: Ascension of Power
LanguageData.AscensionOfPower.description: This being has ascended into a Warrior of Power.
LanguageData.Tribulation.label: Tribulation
LanguageData.Tribulation.description: This being is undergoing Tribulation, the punishment of Heaven upon those that try to surpass the constraints of the Heavenly Qi. Tribulation progresses thier essence realm by 10 + (1% max progress) at the cost of 5 qi + 1% max qi. If they do not have the qi for the cost, they will be struck by damaging lightning and the tribulation will end early.
